document.full_text: at&t inc's $39 billion bid to buy deutsche telekom ag's t-mobile casts doubt on the u.s. government's ability to swiftly deliver policy to meet the booming demand for wireless services.
document.title: analysis: at&t mega merger bad sign for spectrum reform
lines_and_colors: at&t inc's $39 billion bid to buy deutsche telekom ag's t-mobile casts doubt on the u.s. government's ability to swiftly deliver policy to meet the booming demand for wireless services.
